name: Zero-token Bank
specification: The ZeroTokenBank contract accepts deposits and withdrawals from any address. When a deposit is made, the corresponding amount is added to the account balance of the depositing address. These balances are maintained using a mapping within the contract. To withdraw funds, a user can call the withdraw function of the Bank contract with a specified amount. The contract verifies that the depositor has sufficient funds in their account and then initiates a transfer of the specified amount to the depositor's address.

properties.dep-inc-snd-bal: after a successful `deposit(amount)`, the balance entry of `msg.sender` is increased by `amount`.
properties.wd-dec-snd-bal: after a successful `withdraw(amount)`, the balance entry of `msg.sender` is decreased by `amount`.
properties.wd-not-revert: a `withdraw(amount)` call does not revert if `amount` is bigger than zero and less or equal to the balance entry of `msg.sender`.
properties.bal-inc-onlyif-dep: the only way to increase the balance entry of a user `a` is by calling `deposit` with `msg.sender = a`.
properties.bal-dec-onlyif-wd: the only way to decrease the balance entry of a user `a` is by calling `withdraw` with `msg.sender = a`.
properties.bal-nonneg: every balance entry is always non-negative.
properties.always-bal-to-max: any user can always increase their balance up to its maximum value with a single transaction.
properties.always-bal-inc: any user can always increase their balance.
properties.cbal-ge-bal: `contract_balance` is always greater or equal to any balance entry.
properties.cbal-eq-sum-bal: `contract_balance` is always equal to the sum of the balance entries.
properties.bal-sum-dep-wd: for every user `a`, their balance entry is equal to the sum of all `amount`s in successful `deposit(amount)` with `msg.sender = a` minus those in successful `withdraw(amount)` with `msg.sender = a`.
properties.always-wd-all-one: any user can always withdraw their whole balance entry in a single transaction.
properties.always-wd-all-many: any user can always withdraw their whole balance entry in a finite sequence of transaction.
properties.sum-wd-le-sum-dep: for every user `a`, the sum of all `amount`s withdrawn by `a` is less or equal to the sum of all `amount`s deposited by `a`.
properties.frontrun-one: any transaction made by a user will have the same effect when frontrun by a single transaction made by a different user.
properties.frontrun-many: any transaction made by a user will have the same effect when frontrun by a finite sequence of transactions made by different users.
